span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;

    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg {
    background: #f1f3f2;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg a {
    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;
    background-color: #061b30;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;
	font-family: 'Roboto';
	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;
    background: url(/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/inc.jpg) no-repeat left;
}

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {

}

<div id="tourflexBox1" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column one_first">
<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Best of Vietnam Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/vietnam-tour-packages" title="Vietnam Tour Packages">Vietnam</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Best of Vietnam Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c33859b6c24_35748163" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/vietnam-cambodia.jpg" alt="Best of Vietnam Tour Package" title="Best of Vietnam Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Discover the incredible charm, authentic food, rich culture, and the irresistible tourist destinations adorning this beautiful country. Each corner of the country is teeming with several wonders and a trip to Vietnam cherishes your mood and soul. No matter which region of the country you are covering, your senses are always going to be overloaded with beautiful moments. There are several wonders established in the country amongst which many of them are them are enlisted as UNESCO World Heritage sites and if you are excited to explore these places in the country then check out this beautifully crafted Best of Vietnam Tour Package.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Vietnam Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Hanoi</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>After you land at the Hanoi Airport and collect your baggage, you will be greeted and welcomed by our tour representative who will communicate with you in English. After picking you up from the airport, the representative will guide you to reach the pre-booked hotel where you can relax in the comfy hotel room. You are free to spend your day in leisure so if you want to go shopping then walk along the nearby local markets and buy souvenirs to bring back with you.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Hanoi City Tour</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>In the morning, come out of the hotel and drive towards the Temple of Literature which is established at the place that was earlier called as the first university of Vietnam. The great emperor Ly Thanh Tong had built this monument in the year 1070 and initially, this university was opened for only the children of royal families and other exclusives and inside this architecture, you get to see the names of the students holding the doctorate degree and on the other hand, outside this architecture you get to witness the ancient roofs, altars, and courtyards. You will be exploring many other sites established in this city and will get ample opportunity to add several wonderful pictures for your travel frames. End the 2nd day of the trip by retiring yourself in the hotel and with a lip-smacking dinner.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Hanoi – Halong Bay</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Don’t skip your first meal of the day as you are going to cover a long driving distance of 4 hours today so feel energized and then drive towards Halong Bay passing through Red River Delta. you will be making a halt at some of the places in between where you can communicate with the locals and can come to know about their lifestyle and cultures. You will be reaching the desired destination by afternoon and can enjoy the traditional boat ride and also discover some of the most amazing UNESCO world heritage sites. You will be served with several traditional and mouth-watering cuisines in both lunch and dinner followed by your overnight stay at the boat only.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Halong – Hanoi – Danang – Hoi An</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>You will be served with a relishing breakfast at the hotel post which you will continue your cruise ride towards the gorgeous Halong Bay. While moving towards Hanoi Aiport, you will be making halt at the pottery village of time permits you and then continue your drive towards the airport from where you will board the flight to Danang and then on reaching the specific destination, you will be greeted by our representative who will then take you to Hoi An where you will check-into the hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Tra Que Village – Hoi An Tour</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>If you are fond of bike rides or cycling then the day is made for you as today’s schedule is to move towards Tra Que Village by bike or a wheeled cycle. Tra Que Village, popular as a city of vegetables is reckoned for its indifferent aromatic herbs and the unique thing about these plants is that the leaves of these herbs are quite smaller and so hold a particular aroma. Communicate with the locals and get to know about their cultures and learn the recipes of some specific dishes that are cooked with these herbs. Later in the afternoon, move towards the UNESCO world heritage site in Hoi An city which boasts of several ancient homes and well-preserved streets.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Hoi An – Danang – Ho Chi Minh City</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>The morning time is set free for you so explore the wonders of Hoi An on your own and then you will be transferred to Danang Airport from where you will board the flight to Ho Chi Minh City. On reaching the city, you will be welcomed by our local tour guide who will assist in city excursion. There is no other schedule for the day so either relax or walk along the nearby areas before you retire yourself in the comfy hotel room.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Cu Chi Tunnel By Saigon River Express Boat – Ho Chi Minh Half Day City Tour</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Wake up a little early as by 7 am, our guide will reach the hotel and will wait for you in the hotel lobby and from there you will be taken to the car that will drop you at Ho Chi Minh City central pier. You will be reaching the Chu Chi Tunnels Site where you can participate in some exhibitions and then you will be driven to other cities of the country and then post completing lunch drive towards the city that was earlier the capital of the country.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 8 :</span>Ho Chi Minh City – Mekong Delta – Ho Chi Minh</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Start your day trip with your 2 hours’ drive towards Ben Tre district at Mekong Delta from where you will take the boat ride to reach the coconut processing factory and also the coconut activated charcoal factory so that you can get some knowledge about the economy of the country. Discover the agricultural fields and farms where you can marvel at the exotic varieties of vegetables. After completing this city tour, head back to the hotel for dinner followed by a relaxing overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 9 :</span>Departure from Ho Chi Minh City</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post serving yourself with the healthy breakfast at the hotel, check out from the hotel and then drive towards the airport from where you will board the flight for your home. Wish you a happy and safe journey ahead!.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Vietnam Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Is The Best Time To Visit Vietnam?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Summer (May to August) is typically very hot and humid. Northern Vietnam is best visited in the spring (March to April) and autumn (September to November), when the days are generally warm and sunny.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Is Tourism So Popular In Vietnam?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Natural beauty at its finest. Nature endows Vietnam with many beautiful scenes, from ancient forests to the world's largest natural cave. According to Tripzilla, visitors can see the world's best forests, rivers, waterfalls, and coastlines by travelling from north to south.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> How Long Should You Stay In Vietnam?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Travellers with limited time will be relieved to learn that Vietnam is small enough to see the highlights in just a few days. However, the ideal timeframe is about 10 days, as immersing yourself in Vietnam's rich culture takes at least this long.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The Most Popular Vietnamese Street Food?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> When it comes to Vietnamese street food, the most obvious choice has to be Vietnamese noodle soup, ph. This daily local staple consists of chewy rice noodles in a piping hot savoury broth with tender slices of beef or chicken and crunchy, spicy, herby garnishes.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

		<p><span id="wpcf7-673c33859cdba-wrapper" class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap website_fill-wrap" style="display:none !important; visibility:hidden !important;"><label for="wpcf7-673c33859cdba-field" class="hp-message">Please leave this field empty.</label><input id="wpcf7-673c33859cdba-field"  class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text" type="text" name="website_fill" value="" size="40" tabindex="-1" autocomplete="new-password" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-name"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Full Name*" value="" type="text" name="your-name" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-email"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-email wpcf7-validates-as-required wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-email" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Email Id*" value="" type="email" name="your-email" /></span>
		</p>
		<p class="sCntry"><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap your-country"><input class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-intl_tel wpcf7-intl-tel" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="in" data-initialcountry="in" data-preferredcountries="gb-in" value="" type="tel" name="your-country-cf7it-national" /><input name="your-country" type="hidden" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-full" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-name" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-name" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-code" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-code" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-iso2" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-iso2" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-phones"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-tel wpcf7-validates-as-required wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-tel" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="10 digit mobile number" value="" type="tel" name="your-phones" /></span>
		</p>
		<p><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-date"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Time of Travel*" value="" type="text" name="your-date" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-trMess"><textarea cols="40" rows="10" maxlength="140" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-textarea" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Write a description of your tour so we can design the best package for you!" name="your-trMess"></textarea></span>
		</p>
		<div>
			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Best of Vietnam Tour Package Home » International » Vietnam » Best of Vietnam Tour Package Tour Overview Discover the incredible charm, authentic food, rich culture, and the irresistible tourist destinations adorning this beautiful country. Each corner of the country is teeming with several wonders and a trip to Vietnam cherishes your mood and soul....
